trans-unit.source: Supplies base class implementation for all activity designer theme classes used in a workflow design-time environment.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] All classes that supply theme property settings to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes must inherit from the DesignerTheme class.

Designer themes provide a set of property values with which to display background and foreground colors and styles, fonts, and other style settings for the designer classes displayed on a workflow design surface.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> class also inherits from DesignerTheme.

When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> class by using a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> with which the designer theme is associated.
Gets or sets the unqualified name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.

The ApplyTo property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer.
The name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.
A user attempted a set operation when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*> property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets the workflow theme that encapsulates the designer theme.

The ContainingTheme property returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> object that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> used during initialization.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref>.
Gets or sets the type of the designer associated with the designer theme.

The DesignerType property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type.

Possible values for this property include <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, and any classes created by activity designer developers that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the designer to be associated with the current designer theme.
A user attempted a set operation when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*> property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Allows the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> to attempt to free resources and perform other clean-up operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
Finalize releases only unmanaged resources prior to garbage collection.
Performs further initialization tasks beyond those performed by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class provides no default behavior for this method.
Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> must provide their own logic for this method.
Notifies the designer theme class that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.

Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> use this method to make necessary changes when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration value changes from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property.
If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"></xref> enumeration value that the designer theme should now use.
Gets a value that indicates whether the designer theme is read-only.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> is initialized with is not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), ReadOnly obtains its value from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is a null reference (`Nothing`), ReadOnly is `false`.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is assigned to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, the ReadOnly property is set to `true`, and properties on all designer themes associated with this theme cannot be changed.
If required, properties can be set after loading the theme but before assigning it to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
This version of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
